NOW DURING AFTER

Center at https://msc.fema.gov/ flooding, go to the safe location that
portal for information. you have identified. Avoid driving, except in
emergencies.

Obtain extra batteries and charging bridges away without warning. electricity to prevent electric shock.
devices for phones and other critical
equipment. If your vehicle is trapped in rapidly

policies do not cover flooding. Get on the roof.
